steps.name: Peform login request with user credentials
Setting up the BaseURI, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the SensitiveData Filter
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Expecting the response to have Content Type as Application/JSON, Status 200 and Response Time Less than 1000 ms
